title: Investing In Space
itunes:title: Investing In Space
description:
John Wensveen, Executive Director at the Alan B. Levan | NSU Broward Center of Innovation, discusses investing in the space sector. Kevin Near, Equity Research Associate for Bloomberg Intelligence, talks Disney earnings. Greg Hahn, President and CIO of Winthrop Capital Management, discusses the markets. Ernesto Ramos, CIO at BMO Global Asset Management, US, talks markets and investing. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
